title: SYSTEM$GET_TASK_GRAPH_CONFIG | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs:
Returns the value of the configuration string for the task currently executing when invoked from the
statement or stored procedure defined by the task.
Path to the configuration value to return.

Optional argument specifying the path of the value to be retrieved.
Uses the same syntax as Snowflake queries for semi-structured data.
Refer to GET_PATH for more information.
